name: Evergreen Seniors Community Centre
comment:
Recreation centre for older adults
  • arthritis assistance
  • diabetes support group

Diabetes Care Guelph Clinic - Clinical support provided by a registered nurse and/or a registered dietitian

Foot Care Clinic - Support provided by a registered practical nurse

Hearing Improvement Clinics - A self-help program provided for people with hearing impairment and those that require coping with hearing loss

  • diabetes support group
